props.name: icon
props.description: Sets the icon to be displayed inside the tile.

props.name: title
props.description: Sets the title to be displayed inside the tile.

props.name: description
props.description: Sets the description to be displayed inside the tile.

props.name: fixed
props.description: Sets a fixed max and min width for the tile.

props.name: className
props.description: Adds custom classes to the element.
